link.script:
window.soundManager.url = 'https://www.warsawschools.org/plugins/system/screenreader/screenreader/libraries/tts/soundmanager/swf/'; window.soundManager.debugMode = false; window.soundManager.defaultOptions.volume = 80; var screenReaderConfigOptions = { baseURI: 'https://www.warsawschools.org/', token: '92567129f4d36803bcf014a1d9b9d4ba', langCode: 'en', chunkLength: 90, screenReaderVolume: '80', position: 'bottomright', scrolling: 'fixed', targetAppendto: 'html', targetAppendMode: 'bottom', preload: 0, autoBackgroundColor: 0, readPage: 1, readChildNodes: 1, ieHighContrast: 1, ieHighContrastAdvanced: 1, gtranslateIntegration: 0, selectMainpageareaText: 0, excludeScripts: 1, readImages: 0, readImagesAttribute: 'alt', readImagesOrdering: 'before', mainpageSelector: '*[name*=main], *[class*=main], *[id*=main], *[id*=container], *[class*=container]', showlabel: 1, labeltext: 'Screen Reader', screenreaderIcon: 'audio', screenreader: 1, highcontrast: 1, highcontrastAlternate: 1, colorHue: 180, colorBrightness: 6, dyslexicFont: 1, fontsize: 1, fontsizeDefault: 100, fontsizeMin: 50, fontsizeMax: 200, fontsizeSelector: '', fontSizeOverride: 1, fontSizeHeadersIncrement: 20, toolbarBgcolor: '#eeeeee', template: '//m8x4c3j2.stackpathcdn.com/elegant.css', accesskey_play: 'P', accesskey_pause: 'E', accesskey_stop: 'S', accesskey_increase: 'O', accesskey_decrease: 'U', accesskey_reset: 'R', accesskey_highcontrast: 'H', accesskey_highcontrast2: 'J', accesskey_highcontrast3: 'K', accesskey_dyslexic: 'D', accesskey_skiptocontents: 'C', accesskey_minimized: 'L', volume_accesskeys: 1, readerEngine: 'proxy', useMobileReaderEngine: 0, mobileReaderEngine: 'proxy', hideOnMobile: 1, useMinimizedToolbar: 1, showSkipToContents: 1, skipToContentsSelector: '.tm-content', removeLinksTarget: 1 }; (function(){ var cb = function() { var add = function(css, id) { if(document.getElementById(id)) return;
var l = document.createElement('link'); l.rel = 'stylesheet'; l.id = id; l.href = css; var h = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]; h.appendChild(l); } add('//m8x4c3j2.stackpathcdn.com/media/djextensions/css/animate.min.css', 'animate_min_css'); add('//m8x4c3j2.stackpathcdn.com/media/djextensions/css/animate.ext.css', 'animate_ext_css'); }; var raf = requestAnimationFrame || mozRequestAnimationFrame || webkitRequestAnimationFrame || msRequestAnimationFrame; if (raf) raf(cb); else window.addEventListener('load', cb); })();

p.span: The Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) link has a page titled Kindergarten Class of 2033 with information for parents on the registration process and contains links to necessary documents and forms. READ MORE

img.alt: Lincoln Principal Cathy Snyder Announces Retirement Plans

a.title: Lincoln Principal Cathy Snyder Announces Retirement Plans

h3.a: Lincoln Principal Cathy Snyder Announces Retirement Plans

div.p: The longtime principal informed her staff she will be retiring at the end of the 2019-2020 school year. Read More

div.div: Please join Dr. Hoffert as he leads us in the Pledge.

meta.content: Direct Questions to: JoElla Dell Hauselman, WCS Summer Program Coordinator
Lakeview Middle School, 848 E Smith St, Warsaw, IN 46580, USA

div.style: color:white; font-size:2em; line-height: 1.5em; margin-left:15px; margin-top:15px; margin-bottom:3vw;

div.div: is to inspire and equip all students to acquire and apply knowledge and skills while pursuing their dreams and enriching the lives of others.

div.span:
Friday, April 24, 2020: eLearning Day
Please join Dr. David Robertson, Assistant Superintendent for Elementary Education, and his family, Anna, Katie, Eli and Ali, as they lead us in The Pledge of Allegiance.
I pledge Allegiance to the flag
of ...

Thank you Mrs. Goshert and Mrs. Hontz for the drive by check-in and even a social distancing virtual hug for my son. Appreciate all you (and all teachers) are doing for @WCS_District students. #wcsmission https://t.co/QCHV2RU8U4

This week, Mrs. Demopoulos will be sharing: "My Friend Has Autism" by Amanda Doering Tourville. She hopes that each week when she shares these children's books with you, that you are able to learn more about the world of autism. ...

The Indiana School Boards Association recently announced winners for the Exemplary Governance Awards (EGA) Program for 2019. Winners include Warsaw Community School Board members Jay Baumgartner and Jeremy Mullins for Region 2.
Full Story: https://t.co/uF4LGImAhA
#wcsmission https://t.co/RWoYJUhngP

LINK IN BIO: https://bit.ly/WCSClassof2020
Students, Parents/Guardians, and Community Members,
We understand how upsetting and frustrating these unprecedented times can be for graduating students and their families. Warsaw Community Schools has formed a Graduation Taskforce consisting of select senior students, parents, ...

April 23, 2020: Thursday THANK YOU. Today’s THANK YOU is for essential workers in the Construction Industry.
April Boggs, English Language Arts teacher at Lakeview Middle School, offers this tribute to construction workers, “My husband, Derek Boggs, runs a subcontracting ...

Great opportunity to hear some great coaches and authors. Clinic is FREE!
Speakers include @ToddGongwer @JpNerbun @Coach_Lightfoot @LadyCougBball @coach12davis @Kristin_Wodrich @BUPilotsWBB @CoachScottMoore
Contact Coach Krebs for more information! @LennyKrebs https://t.co/EG4KJIC5ew

div.script:
jQuery(document).ready(function($) { function sb_getwinsize() { var wsize = { winCurrentWidth: jQuery(window).width(), newWidth: 0, winCurrentHeight: jQuery(window).height(), newHeight: 0 }; var gapWidth = Math.round((wsize.winCurrentWidth * 15) / 100); var currentWidth = wsize.winCurrentWidth-gapWidth; wsize.newWidth = currentWidth-10; var gapHeight = Math.round((wsize.winCurrentHeight * 5) / 100); var currentHeight = wsize.winCurrentHeight-gapHeight; wsize.newHeight = currentHeight-30; return wsize; } function sb_setwallgrid($wall) { var wallw = $wall.width(); if (wallw >= 960 && wallw < 1200) { var ncol = 3; jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item, #timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-isizer").css({ "width": "31.945%", "margin-bottom": "19.997px" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-twofold").css({ "width": "65.973%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-threefold").css({ "width": "100.001%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-gsizer").css({ "width": "2.083%" }); } else if (wallw >= 768 && wallw < 959) { var ncol = 3; jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item, #timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-isizer").css({ "width": "31.597%", "margin-bottom": "19.999px" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-twofold").css({ "width": "65.798%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-threefold").css({ "width": "99.999%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-gsizer").css({ "width": "2.604%" }); } else if (wallw >= 600 && wallw < 767) { var ncol = 3; jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item, #timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-isizer").css({ "width": "31.111%", "margin-bottom": "19.998px" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-twofold").css({ "width": "65.555%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-threefold").css({ "width": "99.999%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-gsizer").css({ "width": "3.333%" }); } else if (wallw >= 480 && wallw < 599) { var ncol = 2; jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item, #timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-isizer").css({ "width": "47.917%", "margin-bottom": "20.002px" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-twofold").css({ "width": "100.001%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-threefold").css({ "width": "152.085%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-gsizer").css({ "width": "4.167%" }); } else if (wallw >= 320 && wallw < 479) { var ncol = 1; jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item, #timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-isizer").css({ "width": "100%", "margin-bottom": "20.000px" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-twofold").css({ "width": "100%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-threefold").css({ "width": "100%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-gsizer").css({ "width": "0%" }); } else if (wallw <= 319) { var ncol = 1; jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item, #timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-isizer").css({ "width": "100%", "margin-bottom": "20.000px" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-twofold").css({ "width": "100%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-threefold").css({ "width": "100%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-gsizer").css({ "width": "0%" }); } else { var ncol = 3; jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item, #timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-isizer").css({ "width": "32.222%", "margin-bottom": "20.004px" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-twofold").css({ "width": "66.111%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-item.sb-threefold").css({ "width": "100.000%" }); jQuery("#timeline_wall1.sboard .sb-gsizer").css({ "width": "1.667%" }); } var twgut = 20 * (ncol-1); var itemw = (wallw - twgut) / ncol; $wall.isotope({ masonry: { columnWidth: parseFloat(itemw.toFixed(3)), gutter: 20 } }); } var $wall = jQuery("#timeline_wall1").isotope({ itemSelector: ".sb-item", layoutMode: "masonry", getSortData: { dateid: function( itemElem ) { return jQuery( itemElem ).attr("id"); } }, percentPosition: false, transitionDuration: 0, originLeft: true, });sb_setwallgrid($wall); jQuery("#timeline_wall1 .sb-thumb img").lazyload({ effect: "fadeIn", skip_invisible: true, appear: function() { $wall.isotope("layout"); } }); /* layout wall on reload */ function sb_reloadwall($wall) { jQuery(window).one("transitionend webkitTransitionEnd oTransitionEnd otransitionend MSTransitionEnd", function(e) { jQuery(window).trigger("scroll"); jQuery(window).trigger("resize"); $wall.isotope("layout"); }); } sb_reloadwall($wall); /* set wall grid on container resize */ jQuery(window).resize(function() {sb_setwallgrid($wall); setTimeout(function() { jQuery(window).trigger("scroll"); }, 500); }); /* Filter wall by networks */ jQuery(".filter-items").on("click", "span", function() { jQuery(".filter-label,.sb-filter").removeClass("active"); var filterValue = jQuery(this).addClass("active").attr("data-filter"); if ( jQuery(this).hasClass( "filter-label" ) ) { $wall.isotope({ filter: filterValue }); $wall.one( "arrangeComplete", function() { jQuery(window).trigger("resize"); }); } });scrollStop(function () { $wall.isotope("layout"); jQuery(window).trigger("resize"); }); jQuery(".sboard").on("click", ".sb-fetchcomments a", function() { fcobj = jQuery(this).parent(); fcnonce = fcobj.attr("data-nonce");fcobj.html('
'); jQuery.ajax({ type: "post", url: "https://www.warsawschools.org/index.php?option=com_simplesocialmediastream&task=ajaxBoard&view=board&format=raw&" + fcnonce + "=1", data: { action: "sb_fetchcomments", network: fcobj.attr("data-network"), attr: {"results":8,"words":"40","slicepoint":"300","commentwords":"20","titles":"15","userinfo":"top","readmore":"1","order":"random","filters":"1","filter_ads":"1","display_all":"disabled","loadmore":"0","lightboxtype":"media","layout_image":"imgnormal","links":"1","nofollow":"1","https":"1","lazyload":"1","cache":"360","crawl":"10","timeout":"15","debuglog":"1","image_proxy":"1","theme":6,"default_filter":"","filters_order":["instagram","facebook","twitter","flickr","pinterest","google","youtube","vimeo","rss","soundcloud","vk","linkedin"],"live":"off","live_interval":"3","display_ads":{"wall":"0","timeline":"0","feed":"0","carousel":"0"},"transition":"0","stagger":"0","filter_search":0,"originLeft":"true","wall_width":1100,"wall_height":0,"fixWidth":"block","breakpoints":["3","3","3","3","2","1","1"],"itemwidth":"230","gutterX":"20","gutterY":"20","id":1,"type":"wall"}, id: fcobj.attr("data-id"), code: fcobj.attr("data-code") ? fcobj.attr("data-code") : "", feed: fcobj.attr("data-feed"), link: fcobj.attr("data-link"), label: "wall1" }, cache: false }) .done(function( response ) { /* replace comments */ /* re-layout wall */ fcobj.html(response).promise().done(function() { $wall.isotope("layout"); $(window).trigger("scroll"); }); }) .fail(function() { fcobj.html('Show Comments'); alert("Problem reading the comments feed data!"); }); }); jQuery(".sboard .sb-thumb .iframe").colorbox({ iframe: true, maxWidth: "85%", maxHeight: "95%", width: function() { var size = jQuery(this).data("size"); if (size) { sizearr = size.split(","); return parseInt(sizearr[0])+10; } else { return 640; } }, height: function() { var size = jQuery(this).data("size"); if (size) { sizearr = size.split(","); return parseInt(sizearr[1])+10; } else { return 460; } }, onComplete: function() { var size = jQuery(this).data("size"); if (size) { var sizearr = size.split(","); var iframebox = jQuery( "#cboxLoadedContent iframe" ); if (iframebox.length) { iframebox.attr("width", sizearr[0]).attr("height", sizearr[1]); } } } }); jQuery(".sboard .sb-thumb .icbox").colorbox({photo:true, maxWidth:"95%", maxHeight:"95%"}); jQuery(".sboard .sb-thumb .inline").colorbox({inline:true, maxWidth:"95%", maxHeight:"95%"}); jQuery(window).on("resize", function() { if (jQuery("#cboxOverlay").is(":visible")) { var wsize = sb_getwinsize(); var cbox = jQuery( "#cboxLoadedContent" ); var iframebox = jQuery( "#cboxLoadedContent iframe" ); if ( iframebox.length ) { var iframeWidth = iframebox.attr("width"); var iframeHeight = iframebox.attr("height"); if ( jQuery(window).width() <= 767 ) { var pheight = Math.round( (iframeHeight / iframeWidth) * 95 ); jQuery.colorbox.resize({width: "95%", height: pheight+"%"}); } else { if ( cbox.children("div.sb-slide").length > 0) { jQuery.colorbox.resize({maxWidth:"95%", maxHeight:"95%"}); } else { if ( iframeHeight > wsize.newHeight ) { var newWidth = Math.round( (wsize.newHeight * iframeWidth) / iframeHeight); iframeWidth = newWidth; iframeHeight = wsize.newHeight; if ( iframeWidth > wsize.newWidth ) { iframeWidth = wsize.newWidth; iframeHeight = wsize.newHeight; } } jQuery.colorbox.resize({ width: parseInt(iframeWidth)+10, height: parseInt(iframeHeight)+10 }); } } } else { jQuery.colorbox.resize({maxWidth:"95%", maxHeight:"95%"}); } } }); });
